name: unproven
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been shown to be good enough or to be able to do something: It would be unwise to throw billions at unproven technology. a group of talented but unproven young players
not having been shown to be true: Unproven allegations have ruined his career. The suspicion, as yet unproven in court, is that he may have withheld important information.
